discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай эти советы. Обрати внимание на 'should' и 'shouldn't'.

content.text: Tips for a job interview: You <highlight>should</highlight> arrive 10 minutes early. You <highlight>should</highlight> dress professionally. You <highlight>shouldn't</highlight> be late - that's a bad impression. You <highlight>should</highlight> prepare answers to common questions. You <highlight>shouldn't</highlight> speak negatively about past employers. You <highlight>should</highlight> ask questions at the end. You <highlight>shouldn't</highlight> forget to follow up with a thank-you email!
content.question: Is 'should' an obligation like 'must'? Or is it different?
content.question_ru: 'Should' - это обязательство как 'must'? Или это что-то другое?

points.rule: Should = it's a good idea, advice
points.example: You should exercise more. You should eat vegetables.

points.rule: Should + base verb (same for all subjects)
points.example: I should go. She should call. They should study.

points.rule: Shouldn't = it's not a good idea
points.example: You shouldn't smoke. You shouldn't eat too much sugar.
Should I call her? What should I do?

notice.instruction: Find all 'should/shouldn't'. Is it advice or a question?
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все 'should/shouldn't'. Это совет или вопрос?

tasks.text: A: I have a headache. What should I do? B: You should take some medicine. You should also drink water. You shouldn't stare at screens too long. A: Should I stay home? B: If it's bad, yes, you should. You shouldn't go to work sick. You should rest and sleep. A: Thanks for the advice! B: You should feel better soon.

notice.reflection_question: 'You should go' vs 'You have to go' - what's different?
notice.reflection_question_ru: 'You should go' vs 'You have to go' - в чём разница?

sentences.sentence: You ___ be late for the interview.

questions.sentence: You look tired. You ___ get some rest.
She ___ study harder for the exam.
What ___ we do about this problem?

sentences.incorrect: You should to go to bed early.
sentences.correct: You should go to bed early.

produce.instruction_ru: Дай советы по изучению английского языка.
prompts: What should people do to learn English?
Should they use apps? Watch movies?
produce.example: If you want to learn English, you should practice every day. You should watch movies in English with subtitles. You shouldn't be afraid to make mistakes - that's how you learn! You should speak as much as possible. You shouldn't translate everything in your head. You should read books at your level.

texts.title: Health Advice
texts.content: To stay healthy, you should exercise regularly. You should eat fruits and vegetables. You shouldn't smoke or drink too much alcohol. You should sleep 7-8 hours a night. You shouldn't skip breakfast. You should drink plenty of water. You shouldn't sit for too long. You should take breaks and walk around.

texts.title: Study Tips
texts.content: Before an exam, you should review your notes. You should get enough sleep. You shouldn't study all night - it doesn't work! You should eat a good breakfast. You shouldn't panic if you don't know an answer. You should read all questions first. You should manage your time well.

texts.title: Travel Tips
texts.content: When traveling abroad, you should learn some local phrases. You should carry copies of your documents. You shouldn't carry too much cash. You should try local food. You shouldn't offend local customs. You should respect the culture. You should book hotels in advance. You shouldn't travel without insurance.

texts.title: Online Safety
texts.content: Online safety is important. You should use strong passwords. You shouldn't share personal information. You should update your software regularly. You shouldn't click on suspicious links. You should check your privacy settings. You shouldn't trust everyone online. You should report suspicious activity.

texts.title: First Date Advice
texts.content: On a first date, you should be yourself. You should listen carefully. You shouldn't talk only about yourself. You should ask questions. You shouldn't check your phone constantly. You should be polite. You shouldn't discuss exes. You should have fun!
